body:
Actually you don't need to create another geometry. Daylighting component has a boolean input (exportInteriorWalls_) which takes care of this concern. Set exportInteriorWalls_ to False not to export the interior walls.



Warning: split zone is not fully implemented to Honeybee_Honeybee (e.g. there will be no air mix between the zones and radiation won't pass to the core zone unless you create internal windows.
